references.paper_title: Secretary and online matching problems with machine learned advice
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of algorithms with predictions in secretary problems, which is a core concept for this paper.
This paper provides a framework for studying secretary problems with machine learned advice and introduces the robustness-consistency trade-off, which is also studied in this paper.
This paper studies the secretary problem with strong predictions, providing a contrast to this paper's weaker prediction model.
This paper is foundational to the secretary problem and establishes the 1/e competitive ratio, which this paper aims to improve upon.
This paper studies online search problems with weak predictions, offering a comparison with the approach taken in this paper.
